Homewood Platform Elevator Out
The Homewood platform elevator is out of service. Alternate accessible stations are Calumet or Flossmoor.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Inbound trains stopped Clybourn
Inbound trains are stopped at Clybourn due to switch problems.  Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
North End Boarding
Metra Electric inbound trains will board from the north end of the platform at 47th, 27th, 23rd McCormick Place and 18th Street.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPNW Extensive Delays
Inbound and outbound UPNW train may be operating with extensive delays.  Customers should expect operational changes.  Trains are operating out of sequence.  Please stand behind the yellow line.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Construction begins April 21 at 103rd Street Washington Heights Station.
Metra forces will begin work Friday, April 21 on a major rehab project at the 103rd Street/Washington Heights Station on the Rock Island Line, for more informaiton click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert MD-N - Metra anticipates a normal inbound rush hour

With the overnight opening of more tracks at Chicago Union Station, Metra anticipates running a normal inbound rush-hour this morning. Some trains may arrive on different station tracks, but all trains will terminate at Chicago Union Station.

Metra Alert BNSF - Cass Avenue closing at BNSF tracks May 19-27 for crossing replacement
Cass Avenue closing at BNSF tracks May 19-27 for crossing replacement.  For full details, click HERE.
